messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] blood drive and OT subjects
messages.msgSnippet: Well I didn t realize the list wasn t local when I sent the request for help. Since I m an unschooler I thought my request would be welcomed. I was wrong.
messages.messageBody:
Well I didn't realize the list wasn't local when I sent the request for
help. Since I'm an unschooler I thought my request would be welcomed. I was
wrong.

Virginia Glasser
StampinUp! Demonstrator
http://www.virginiaglasser.stampinup.net
I'm proud to be a Stampin' Up demonstrator!
Ask me how you can earn free stamping or scrapbooking supplies!




-----Original Message-----
From: Ren Allen [mailto:starsuncloud@...]
Sent: Saturday, November 06, 2004 11:07 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] blood drive and OT subjects



"I'm a little miffed though that you wouldn't allow an
announcement of such importance on the boards though if it's not
related
directly to unschooling."

You're miffed because I didn't allow WHAT announcement? Your
announcement came to this list, and I asked for those kind of
announcements to not come to this list unless absolutely necessary.

If we all started posting about people in dire need in each of our
regions, we wouldn't have an unschooling list. This list was created
for people to talk about unschooling. If it was a family of
unschoolers, it might be different.
We can't possibly respond to every regional dilemna, so please keep
them at local lists or lists where that kind of post is welcome.

Ren




Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
